00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include "ls_step_solver.h"
00023 using namespace std;
00024 
00025 #ifdef WIN32
00026 #include <float.h>
00027 static inline int finite(double d) { return _finite(d); }
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 ls_step_solver::ls_step_solver(int state_size, int maximum_scalar_measure_number)
00031 {
00032   this->maximum_scalar_measure_number = maximum_scalar_measure_number;
00033 
00034   M_copy = cvCreateMat(maximum_scalar_measure_number, state_size, CV_64F);
00035   M1 = new double[maximum_scalar_measure_number];
00036   M2 = new double[maximum_scalar_measure_number];
00037   b_copy = new double[maximum_scalar_measure_number];
00038 }
00039 
00040 ls_step_solver::~ls_step_solver()
00041 {
00042         delete[] M1;
00043         delete[] M2;
00044         delete[] b_copy;
00045         if (M_copy) cvReleaseMat(&M_copy);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void ls_step_solver::resize(int state_size, int maximum_scalar_measure_number)
00049 {
00050         if (maximum_scalar_measure_number > M_copy->rows ||
00051                         state_size > M_copy->cols) {
00052                 cvReleaseMat(&M_copy);
00053                 delete[] M1;
00054                 delete[] M2;
00055                 delete[] b_copy;
00056 
00057                 this->maximum_scalar_measure_number = maximum_scalar_measure_number;
00058                 M_copy = cvCreateMat(maximum_scalar_measure_number, state_size, CV_64F);
00059                 M1 = new double[maximum_scalar_measure_number];
00060                 M2 = new double[maximum_scalar_measure_number];
00061                 b_copy = new double[maximum_scalar_measure_number];
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 bool ls_step_solver::qr_solve(CvMat * M, CvMat * b, CvMat * X)
00066 {
00067 #ifndef SORRY_VINCENT_Y_A_UN_BUG
00068         return cvSolve(M, b, X,  CV_LU) != 0;
00069 #else
00070   int nr = M->rows;
00071   int nc = M->cols;
00072   int Mnc = M_copy->cols;
00073 
00074   assert(M_copy->rows == maximum_scalar_measure_number);
00075   assert(M->cols == M_copy->cols);
00076   assert(M->rows <= M_copy->rows);
00077   CvMat subM;
00078   cvGetSubRect(M_copy, &subM, cvRect(0,0,M->cols, M->rows));
00079   cvCopy(M, &subM);
00080   /*
00081   // copy M -> M_copy
00082   for(int i = 0; i < nr; i++)
00083   {
00084     double * pM = M->data.db + i * nc;
00085     double * pMc = M_copy->data.db + i * Mnc;
00086 
00087     for(int j = 0; j < nc; j++)
00088       pMc[j] = pM[j];
00089   }
00090   */
00091 
00092   assert(nc <= maximum_scalar_measure_number);
00093   assert(nr <= maximum_scalar_measure_number);
00094 
00095   // Decomposition QR:
00096   double * pM = M_copy->data.db;
00097 
00098   bool singular = false;
00099   double * ppMkk = pM;
00100   for(int k = 0; k < nc; k++)
00101   {
00102     double * ppMik = ppMkk;
00103     double eta = fabs(*ppMik);
00104     for(int i = k + 1; i < nr; i++)
00105     {
00106       double elt = fabs(*ppMik);
00107       if (eta < elt) eta = elt;
00108       ppMik += Mnc;
00109     }
00110 
00111     if (eta == 0)
00112     {
00113       M1[k] = M2[k] = 0;
00114       singular = true;
00115     }
00116     else
00117     {
00118       double sum = 0;
00119       double inv_eta = 1. / eta;
00120       double * ppMik = ppMkk;
00121       for(int i = k; i < nr; i++)
00122       {
00123         *ppMik *= inv_eta;
00124         sum += *ppMik * *ppMik;
00125         ppMik += Mnc;
00126       }
00127       double sigma = sqrt(sum);
00128       if (*ppMkk < 0)
00129         sigma = -sigma;
00130       *ppMkk += sigma;
00131       M1[k] = sigma * *ppMkk;
00132       M2[k] = -eta * sigma;
00133       for(int j = k + 1; j < nc; j++)
00134       {
00135         double sum = 0;
00136         double * ppMik = ppMkk;
00137         int Djk = j - k;
00138         for(int i = k; i < nr; i++)
00139         {
00140           sum += *ppMik * ppMik[Djk];
00141           ppMik += Mnc;
00142         }
00143         double tau = sum / M1[k];
00144         ppMik = ppMkk;
00145         for(int i = k; i < nr; i++)
00146         {
00147           ppMik[Djk] -= tau * *ppMik;
00148           ppMik += Mnc;
00149         }
00150       }
00151     }
00152     ppMkk += Mnc + 1;
00153   }
00154 
00155   assert(M_copy->rows == maximum_scalar_measure_number);
00156 
00157   // b_copy <- Qt b
00158   for(int i = 0; i < nr; i++)
00159     b_copy[i] = b->data.db[i];
00160   double * ppMjj = pM;
00161   for(int j = 0; j < nc; j++)
00162   {
00163     double tau = 0;
00164     double * ppMij = ppMjj;
00165     for(int i = j; i < nr; i++)
00166     {
00167       tau += *ppMij * b_copy[i];
00168       ppMij += Mnc;
00169     }
00170     tau /= M1[j];
00171     ppMij = ppMjj;
00172     for(int i = j; i < nr; i++)
00173     {
00174       b_copy[i] -= tau * *ppMij;
00175       ppMij += Mnc;
00176     }
00177     ppMjj += Mnc + 1;
00178   }
00179 
00180   assert(M_copy->rows == maximum_scalar_measure_number);
00181 
00182   // X = R-1 b
00183   double * p_X = X->data.db;
00184   p_X[nc - 1] = b_copy[nc - 1] / M2[nc - 1];
00185   if (!finite(p_X[nc-1])) return false;
00186   for(int i = nc - 2; i >= 0; i--)
00187   {
00188     double sum = 0;
00189     double * ppMij = pM + i * Mnc + (i + 1);
00190 
00191     for(int j = i + 1; j < nc; j++)
00192     {
00193       sum += *ppMij * p_X[j];
00194       ppMij++;
00195     }
00196     p_X[i] = (b_copy[i] - sum) / M2[i];
00197     if (!finite(p_X[i])) return false;
00198   }
00199   assert(M_copy->rows == maximum_scalar_measure_number);
00200   return true;
00201 #endif
00202 }
